website_summaries.verdict: As the first "affordable" hi-fi streamer, the Pioneer N-30 puts on a good performance, but the controls could be so much easier to use.
pros: The Pioneer Elite N-30 Network Audio Player certainly looks like a $500 item, with a solid build and a stylish remote
Its sound quality is a clear head and shoulders above entry-level media players
cons: The 2.5-inch screen is too small and the flawed smartphone app doesn't do much to make up for it
Adding wireless adds a hefty $150 to the bill
You may find that the onboard sound of your receiver is every bit as good as the Pioneer's analog outs

customer_reviews.title: Very very limited, but the price is good.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very limited. No built in wifi. You have to buy an adaptor for bluetooth. The screen can't be seen from four feet away. The network was impossible and does not work. There is no support for any streaming services. Unless you only want to use internet radio which does not find all of the stations you look up or at via USB. It is pretty much useless. On the bright side the sound and price are very good if you are on a budget. With the extra money you have to spend to get some kind of use out of it I'd buy something else. I've requested a return.
customer_reviews.author: Jg BEWA

customer_reviews.title: ... Elite N- 50 Audiophile Network Auudio player is a beautiful music player
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer Elite N- 50 Audiophile Network Auudio player is a beautiful music player. The sound quality is very good. I use it mainly for its internet radio capability. I also listen to my IPod through the pioneer N-50 and the sound is just lovely. The negative things about the pioneer N-50 is that it fails to play some of the Internet radio stations that have been authorized by radio-pioneer.com. Also the Pioneer Elite N-50 has no WiFi capability and you need to buy a WiFi adapter or you will have to hard wire it to your router.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer N50
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with my purchase. Very fast shipping, item arrived in excellent condition. Give it a few days to break in and it will sound amazing. Wish I could day the same about the Pioneer control app...while it gets the job done it looks and feels like an app that was developed 10 years ago and nobody bothered to update:) I tried both digital and analogue outputs and my preferred set up is Pure Audio via analogue: with a quality RCA interconnects the soundstage really opens up and the details are greatly enhanced. Overall a great sounding, well built piece of kit. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Radu

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality. Software issues.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the audio quality of the unit. Impressively build too. The unit I received sometimes showed Error 9 on the screen and unit was not operable after that. I asked for a new one but seller refunded the full amount
customer_reviews.author: Rense Abraham Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you have a very low tolerance threshold like me or are looking for a quick bargain
customer_reviews.text: Terrible software / firmware issues. Loses network connectivity quite often while streaming using a phone over Airplay. Refuses to boot up at random intervals. Having said that, the digital to analog conversion is just superb!!! What a difference it makes to the output! The pioneer control app is a joke. Pioneer has launched a completely new line of network players and has abandoned the N-30 and N-50 altogether. Pity.....
customer_reviews.author: Aniruddha Sen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. Very easy to navigate. Receive CD quality sound. Only accepts up iPhone 4 model.
customer_reviews.author: LeAmelia

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an Apple Airport Express that I was using to stream music via Airplay from my iPhone/iPad. The improvement in sound quality compared to the Airport Express was unbelievable. Even my wife noticed and complemented the sound (and she's no Audiophile). One minor difference in functionality is that you could control the volume from the iPhone with the Airport Express but the N30 does not respond to volume controls so you have make adjustments to volume at the receiver/preamp.
customer_reviews.author: batman

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Most for Much Less
customer_reviews.text: Excellent player for the right price. Plays everything I need and more, with infrared remote control and iPhone app that can operate it remotely from anywhere in the house. Plays all file types in their native resolution with a number of audio servers available. I chose JRiver Media Center, which works well. Some of these players cost thousands of unnecessary dollars, but now I've got mine and it is as good or better than the high priced spread!
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Eickmeier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent audiophile network audio player. Flawless interface with my DLNA network attached storage (380 GB of music files).
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great audiophile peace to own, can play music from any source.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound = 5 stars + / functionality = 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Listeng music is really great with this, sounding natural, detailed and spacy. But to get there ain't easy - due to software incompabilities and poor functionality, despite some firmware updates untill mid 2014 !
customer_reviews.author: HiFi Freak

product_meta.title: Pioneer Elite N-30 Audiophile Network Audio Player with AirPlay & DLNA 1.5
product_meta.description: Size:N30Now music enthusiasts have an exceptional new component to be enthusiastic about. The Pioneer Elite N-30 Network Audio Player. With its ability to download at up to 7 times the quality of cd’s, the N-30 stylishly allows you access to online audio content from any room in your house. Connecting to your home network, you can enjoy a wide variety of online music services remotely.
feature_bullets: Pioneer Elite Audiophile Networked Audio Player featuring Air Play and DLNA 1.5
No Setup or Pairing Required - Air Play uses existing Wi-Fi Network
View Album Art and Metadata on Music Tap's full-color 2.5" screen
vTuner Internet Radio; iPhone or Android Control App
EL Transformer; Made for iPod, iPhone Certified with USB Connection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars19 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
